# handleClose

The handleClose method destroys the shared input and output queues.

## Declaration

```swift
virtual void handleClose(
 IOService *forClient, 
 IOOptionBits options ); 
```

## Parameters

- **options**: 

## Opening and closing streams

- **handleOpen**: The handleOpen() method relies on the default IOService behavior to ensure that only one client has the stream open at a time. The shared input and output queues are created at open time.
